title: 17: The Trivium
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The Trivium--grammar, logic, and rhetoric--provides the three grand divisions upon which classical education is based. Sounds boring, I know, but it ain't so bad.
itunes:author: Graeme, A.J., & Bees
itunes:subtitle: We discuss the Trivium: the three divisions of the process of learning
itunes:summary: The Trivium--grammar, logic, and rhetoric--provides the three grand divisions upon which classical education is based. Sounds boring, I know, but it ain't so bad.
itunes:title: 17: The Trivium
